original_text: And David laid up these words in his heart, and was sore afraid of Achish the king of Gath.
korean_text: 다윗이 이 말을 그의 마음에 두고 가드 왕 아기스를 심히 두려워하여

sentences.original_text: And David laid up these words in his heart
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다윗은 이 말들을 마음에 품었고

sentences.original_text: and was sore afraid of Achish the king of Gath
